revised_title: Phonon Critical-Point Analysis of Diamond, Silicon, and Germanium
tldr: The authors conducted a critical-point analysis of the phonon spectra of diamond, silicon, and germanium using lattice dynamics calculations and neutron scattering results. They proposed a scheme for the positions and types of critical points in these materials, which helped interpret infra-red absorption and Raman scattering spectra. This analysis provided more accurate phonon frequencies at specific symmetry points in the Brillouin zone.
